title: Any item cannot be selected initially in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt.

OB: Unable to select any item in the library outline view.

EB: The selected item should be highlighted and its details should be displayed in the library outline view.

SR: 1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
3. Verify if the item can be selected and its details are displayed properly.
